mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wechat_receive_message (msg_id, to_user_name, from_user_name, create_time, msg_type, content, pic_url, media_id, agent_id) VALUES ( #{msgId}, #{toUserName}, #{fromUserName}, TO_DATE(#{createTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #{msgType}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediaId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentId} )
